segments.text: I see the woman drying the plate with such concentration, it's almost like she's in her own little world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, but she seems completely oblivious to the chaos unfolding around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a knot in my stomach watching the boy on the stool; it looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way the garden outside is so peaceful makes the scene even more jarring.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the girl with her hand raised, waiting for a cookie, as if this is a perfectly normal moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising how mundane this kitchen seems despite the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how the woman is so absorbed in her task that she can't see the risks around her.
segments.speaker: PAR
